revised_title: Improving Methods of Exploiting Remotely Sensed Imagery for Civil Applications
tldr: This article discusses the challenges and potential improvements in using remotely sensed imagery for civil applications. The authors highlight the need for better sensor designs and reflectance extraction algorithms to provide accurate and useful information. They also emphasize the importance of collaboration between researchers, users, and funding sources to develop and implement effective methods for exploiting remotely sensed data.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Remote Sensing and GIS
